item.title: Beocord 5000 (4716/4715): Removing the Drive Mechanism
item.description:
Note: This post documents an outdated method. There’s a simpler way to remove the drive that doesn’t involve lifting the Pre-Amplifier board or disconnecting the solenoid linkage. See my later post for the updated procedure. Following advice from ‘chartz’ and ‘sonavor’ on Beoworld.org (link to thread), I began replacing the belts in my Beocord 5000 (4716), which had become loose and stretched over time. The first step is removing the drive mechanism...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-47164715-removing-the-drive-mechanism/

item.title: Beocord 5000 (4715/4716): Replacing the Belts
item.description:
I obtained replacement belts for my Beocord 5000 from ‘Dillen’ on Beoworld.org, allowing me to resume my work on the unit. Replacing the belts is a straightforward process, but it demands patience because the drive mechanism requires significant disassembly. The service manual only explains how to access the top belts, not the bottom ones. However, a Beoworld.org thread provided valuable insights and cautions, including a story about a broken PCB #3 (“Electronic Switch”) resulting from improper belt installation...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-47154716-replacing-the-belts/

item.title: The InterContinental Dubai Marina is now accepting advance bookings for Marina Social
item.description:
Source: InterContinental Dubai Marina. Atherton. The InterContinental Dubai Marina has announced the official opening date for Marina Social and The Social Room, the first restaurant in the region from Michelin-starred UK chef Jason Atherton. Located in the heart of Dubai Marina, the restaurant and bar will begin taking reservations on August 2nd and will open to the public on September 4th. Marina Social will bring Jason Atherton’s signature style of refined yet approachable dining to the recently opened InterContinental Dubai Marina...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-intercontinental-dubai-marina-is-now-accepting-advance-bookings-for-marina-social/

item.title: Beocord 5000 (4716/4715): First Contact
item.description:
After a couple of evenings with the Beomaster 6000, my curiosity led me to the non-working Beocord 5000 (4716). The design is quite impressive, especially the electronic VU meters that use seven incandescent light bulbs each. This cutting-edge technology from the past is incredible! The attention to detail is remarkable. Here are some pictures: Plexiglass cover removed: Notice the two red tabs above the level knobs, they display the recording level!..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-47164715-first-contact/
